scripts.deploy-dev: graph deploy vebetter/dao-dev --ipfs http://_.graph.vet:5001 --node http://_.graph.vet:8020 subgraph.yaml --version-label 1
scripts.deploy: graph deploy vebetter/dao --ipfs http://_.graph.vet:5001 --node http://_.graph.vet:8020 subgraph.yaml --version-label 1
scripts.deploy2: graph deploy vebetter/dao --ipfs http://__.graph.vet:5001 --node http://__.graph.vet:8020 subgraph.yaml --version-label 1
